Uses of Class
toys.Toy

  • Packages that use Toy 
    Package Description
    gui
    Contains the classes related to the gui.
    pets
    Provides the Pet superclass and its sub classes, the 6 species of pet which players can own in the game.
    player
    Provides the player class which represents players in the game.
    playerTests
    Tests for the player class.
    toys
    Provides the Toy superclass and its subclasses, the 6 toys available in the store that pets can play with.
    toyTests
    Tests for the toy class, mostly of getter/setter method and the toy.use() method.
